A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's hard for me get know how to rate this. The payoff for some of the risks was great. Overall the pacing was off and my biggest problem is with the direction taken with the character of Luke Skywalker. It's not consistent with the character from the original trilogy. Additionally set ups from the last movie were seemingly passed over. My perception of this show could change with the last installment but for now\, it falls short.
